messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It was fun but we bout to bounce

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ay now we in danger stay safe out there

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You're all being fired. You're all worthless and should be shot.

messages.author: Trades-the-Goods (Curator)
messages.body:
Local religion on the station supports COMMUNISM!???!?1

Local chaplain Lane Prosswell starts new religion on station in support of communism, attempts to gain access to supermatter to no avail.

What could that mean? Stay tuned for more info.

messages.author: Trades-the-Goods (Curator)
messages.body:
New Private Botany Area Replaces Tool Storage!

Rainbow Blitz and and Athea Rose found replacing the public tool storage with a private botany area. A heavily fortified one by the looks of it.

What could this mean for the station? Stay tuned for more info.
